title: What Many Pennsylvanians Saw in Fetterman
description: By reinventing his Senate campaign after a stroke, Lt. Gov. John Fetterman ended up connecting with voters who responded to his saga of loss and comeback.
dc:creator: Trip Gabriel
media:description: Lt. Gov. John Fetterman greeted union steelworkers at a canvassing event in Coatesville, Pa., the morning before Election Day.
